QuestData.Title: The Only Cure
QuestData.Description:
Maldraxxus is on the path to reclaiming its rightful role as defender of the Shadowlands. But the treasonous attack on Bastion remains a stain on our honor.
We had thought Gharmal's forces routed, but we've received word from the Paragon of Courage that reinforcements have begun arriving at her temple.
This threat must be eliminated.
I have volunteered to spearhead this operation. Your support would be an asset, $p.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with the Paragon of Courage in Bastion.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with the Paragon of Courage in Bastion.
QuestData.RewardText: Your arrival is expected. We await results.
